files.description: Module for searching words in the loaded Quran data. Contains various functions for filtering, counting, and retrieving Quran verses based on search criteria such as individual words, phrases, surah numbers, and verse ranges.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Search for a word in the Quran verses. Iterates over Quran data and returns verses containing the search word, supporting both case-sensitive and case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to perform case-sensitive search; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group
functions.description: Search for a specific word group (phrase) in the Quran verses, returning verses that contain the exact phrase based on the provided case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (exact phrase) to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to perform case-sensitive search; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_in_surah
functions.description: Search for a word within a specific Surah in the Quran data. Filters verses by surah number and performs a case-insensitive search for the word.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number to search within.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.
